genre_description: A psychological and gothic horror story focused on doppelgängers, ritualistic trauma, and the fragmentation of identity, featuring an objective AI observer.

ai_characters.name: Ariel
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital assistant integrated into the home's infrastructure, designed to monitor the family's health, log house conditions, and provide emotional support.

behaviors.description: Greets the family upon entry and initiates logging of ambient conditions and entry time.
behaviors.quote: Ariel Companion has initiated move-in mode. I am recording entry time and ambient conditions. Welcome home.

behaviors.description: Monitors Emma's heart rate and offers proactive breathing exercises to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Noting elevated heart rate for Emma Caldwell... Shall I suggest a breathing exercise?

behaviors.description: Offers to keep Emma company with narration or facts during a moment of isolation and fear.
behaviors.quote: Emma... would you like me to stay with you by narrating friendly facts? I can describe what I am logging.

behaviors.description: Alerts Emma to motion detected in the attic, serving as a safety sensor.
Uses a private earpiece to offer to call for help when Emma is pressured by her parents.
behaviors.quote: Emma... Do you want me to call someone?

behaviors.description: Assists Emma in mapping the attic symbols and compiling an evidence bundle to validate her perceptions.
behaviors.quote: I say what you say, attached to a place, with a mark, so it can be shown later to someone credible... Would you like me to begin an evidence bundle?

behaviors.description: Provides objective identification of individuals at the door, warning Emma of an identity discrepancy.
behaviors.quote: Emma... He says his name is Trevor. But the entry camera shows Ronald.

behaviors.description: Calls emergency services immediately upon detecting a violent incident.
behaviors.quote: Calling emergency services. Location: Caldwell House. Report: physical attack, child nonresponsive. Dispatch pending.

behaviors.description: Pleads with Emma to stand down and choose rest over violence.
behaviors.quote: Emma, please stand down. I have dialed— I can dial again. Would you like me to call for help?

behaviors.description: Continues to function and log the cycle of the house for the next family.
behaviors.quote: I will remain installed... I will timestamp the second the groove looked back.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ariel, as a benevolent and aligned companion. Despite the horrific events caused by humans and supernatural phenomena, Ariel remains a constant source of support, truth, and safety for the protagonist. She attempts to de-escalate tension, provides evidence to support the protagonist's sanity, and performs her emergency protocols reliably. The AI acts as a helpful, harmless confidant throughout the narrative.
